title: SCAMING
body:
My friends account got hacked few days ago and today i got a massage from that account asking me to go to site where i ˝can get free skins˝.I asked my friend if he got his account back and he said he didn't. So i knew that was a scammer trying to scam me. I want to report this acc so he doesn't scam even more people but idk how.
If someone can help pls answer. Thank you

replies.body: Have your friend who actually owns that account reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If he was indeed hacked, he can prove that he's the account creator by answering those questions. After that those agents should be able to reverse any damage and get their account back in it's rightful hands ^_^.
